messages.title: Austerity isn't working
messages.content: Over 900,000 people had to rely on a foodbank to feed themselves last year in the 6th richest country on earth.

messages.title: We Deserve Better
messages.content: This election will give you a real opportunity to vote for a different course for Bradford West. We can't afford another five years of crippling austerity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voting Green is presented as the only solution to the problem of austerity.

issues.socialWelfare: Over 900,000 people had to rely on a foodbank to feed themselves last year

images.caption: Austerity isn't working. In the 6th richest country on earth over 900,000 people had to rely on a foodbank to feed themselves last year.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Matt Edwards, 27 Fern Place, Shipley on behalf of Celia Hickson, 7 Heather Drive, Shipley.
